data.oai_dc:dc: The Hymenoptera collection at the Zoological Research Museum Alexander Koenig contains parts of the collection of Johann Klapperich as well as the collections of W. Aerts, Johannes Gallasch, R. Oberthür, August Reichensperger, R. Roesler, A. Schoop and the permanent loan of the Zoo Cologne|19,372 occurrences
